title: Crab and grapefruit salad
ingredients: ['4 grapefruits', '2 tbsp reduced-fat mayonnaise', '1 tbsp finely chopped mango chutney', '2 tsp Dijon mustard', '1 tsp toasted sesame oil', 'pepper to taste', '350g (12oz) white crabmeat, picked over to remove any cartilage', '125g (4½oz) watercress, tough stalks trimmed', '1 head chicory, cut crossways into 1cm (½in) strips', '1 soft, round lettuce, separated into leaves']
